languages.text: "Раз таково твое прощение, мон-кай, я перенесу его с достоинством. И более я не буду приближаться к тебе наедине, дабы не смущать умы твоих слуг". {n}Голос Ирлиэт звучит тускло и безжизненно. Она не поднимает на вас более свой взгляд.{/n}

"If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Раз таково твое прощение, мон-кай, я перенесу его с достоинством. И более я не буду приближаться к тебе наедине, дабы не смущать умы твоих слуг". {n}Голос Ирлиэт звучит тускло и безжизненно. Она не поднимает на вас более свой взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She does not raise her eyes at you anymore.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She does not raise her eyes at you anymore.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如果鞭刑代表你的宽恕，猴子，我愿意体面地接受这样的惩罚。我不会再单独与你接触，以免你的仆人为此担惊受怕。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音听起来毫无生气，不再与你有任何目光接触。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果鞭刑代表你的宽恕，猴子，我愿意体面地接受这样的惩罚。我不会再单独与你接触，以免你的仆人为此担惊受怕。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音听起来毫无生气，不再与你有任何目光接触。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Si este es tu perdón, mon-keigh, lo afrontaré con dignidad. Y nunca volveré a acercarme a ti cuando estés {mf|solo|sola}, para que tus sirvientes no tengan nada que temer». {n}La voz de Yrliet suena apagada y vacía. Ya no te mira a los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si este es tu perdón, mon-keigh, lo afrontaré con dignidad. Y nunca volveré a acercarme a ti cuando estés {mf|solo|sola}, para que tus sirvientes no tengan nada que temer». {n}La voz de Yrliet suena apagada y vacía. Ya no te mira a los ojos.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Si cela me permet d'obtenir votre pardon, mon-keigh, j'y ferai face avec dignité. Et je veillerai à ne plus jamais m'approcher de vous quand vous êtes {mf|seul|seule}, afin de rassurer vos serviteurs, » {n}dit-elle d'une voix monocorde en fuyant votre regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si cela me permet d'obtenir votre pardon, mon-keigh, j'y ferai face avec dignité. Et je veillerai à ne plus jamais m'approcher de vous quand vous êtes {mf|seul|seule}, afin de rassurer vos serviteurs, » {n}dit-elle d'une voix monocorde en fuyant votre regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn das Eure Vergebung ist, Chem-Pan-Sey, werde ich ihr mit Würde begegnen. Und ich werde mich Euch nie wieder alleine nähern, damit Eure Diener keine Angst haben müssen." {n}Yrliets Stimme klingt leblos und stumpf. Sie sieht dir nicht mehr in die Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das Eure Vergebung ist, Chem-Pan-Sey, werde ich ihr mit Würde begegnen. Und ich werde mich Euch nie wieder alleine nähern, damit Eure Diener keine Angst haben müssen." {n}Yrliets Stimme klingt leblos und stumpf. Sie sieht dir nicht mehr in die Augen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイよ、これがお前の許しであるなら、我は堂々とそれに立ち向かおう。従者たちの恐怖を和らげるためにも、二度とお前に一人きりでは近づくまい」{n}ユリエットの声は生気を失い、鈍く響く。彼女はもうあなたと目合わせようとはしなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイよ、これがお前の許しであるなら、我は堂々とそれに立ち向かおう。従者たちの恐怖を和らげるためにも、二度とお前に一人きりでは近づくまい」{n}ユリエットの声は生気を失い、鈍く響く。彼女はもうあなたと目合わせようとはしなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eğer affın buysa mon-keigh, şerefle boyun eğeceğim. Hizmetkârlarının korkusunu hafifletmek adına bir daha sana yalnızken yaklaşmayacağım." {n}Yrliet'in sesi, cansız ve duygusuz çıkıyor. Artık gözlerinin içine bakmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If this is your forgiveness, mon-keigh, I will face it with dignity. And I will never approach you alone again, to ease the fears of your servants." {n}Yrliet's voice sounds lifeless and dull. She no longer meets your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eğer affın buysa mon-keigh, şerefle boyun eğeceğim. Hizmetkârlarının korkusunu hafifletmek adına bir daha sana asla yalnızken yaklaşmayacağım." {n}Yrliet'in sesi cansız ve duygusuz. Artık gözlerinin içine bakmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
